name: BEAT THE MOLE 3D
description:
Description :

This  is a very interesting and hilarious WHAC-A-MOLE  type game created by Games-Panther. This will definitely entertain your friends, family and you also.  This is a very relaxing game you can play at leisure times. BEST OF LUCK!

How to play :

Hole numbers are given below each hole. Press the number on your keyboard accordingly. ENJOY!
